name: With Darkness comes Light Demo
description:
This demo is about a demon that's going to work with you to prove to God that it belongs to heaven. Its supposed to contain all supernatural beings across all mythologies into one story thats gonna result in you fighting them to prove.

Will you take the Devil's throne or join God's army or will you make the world and all its dimensions kneel to you.

currently it doesn't have all the artwork, sounds, effects, and music plus the whole story

I apologise for the incomplete game and its lack of art there and there. This is due to me trying to reach the deadline for the nanoreno

You can reach me at twitter = @MotubatseTetelo to view the progress of the official Game
